description: The Straw Hat Pirates' second ship, where Brook experiences his adjustment period as the newest crew member.

keyEvents.title: Brook Discovers the Crew's Journal
keyEvents.description: Brook finds the crew's adventure journal aboard the Thousand Sunny and reads about all their shared experiences.
keyEvents.significance: The ship serves as the setting for Brook's emotional journey of finding belonging.

keyEvents.title: Robin and Brook's Heart-to-Heart
keyEvents.description: Robin consoles Brook aboard the ship, sharing her own experience of finding family with the crew.
keyEvents.significance: The Thousand Sunny serves as the intimate setting for meaningful crew bonding.

keyEvents.title: Brook Plays Bink's Sake
keyEvents.description: Brook performs Bink's Sake on violin as the crew relaxes throughout the ship at sunset.
keyEvents.significance: The ship becomes truly home to Brook as he finds his place through music.
